snippet: After months of rhetoric, North Korea said it was ready to discuss easing tensions and denuclearization with the United States.
abstract: North Korea proposes high-level talks with United States aimed at denuclearizing Korean Peninsula; demands removal of all American nuclear threats in region and reiterates desire to negotiate treaty to replace 1953 Korean War armistice and formally end war.
lead_paragraph: After months of rhetoric, North Korea said it was ready to discuss easing tensions and denuclearization with the United States.

headline.main: North Korea Proposes High-Level Talks With U.S.
headline.print_headline: North Korea Proposes Talks On Security With the U.S.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
